beginner.name: CopyCat
beginner.description: Mirrors opponent moves - perfect for testing pattern recognition

beginner.name: BongcloudEnthusiast
beginner.description: Always plays bongcloud opening - tests opening exploitation

intermediate.description: Material and tempo focused with multi-move search

difficulty_ranges.beginner: 192-500 ELO - Basic patterns and exploitable weaknesses
difficulty_ranges.intermediate: 501-1300 ELO - Tactical awareness and basic strategy
difficulty_ranges.advanced: 1301-2200 ELO - Advanced positioning and search depth

test_categories.pattern_recognition: Tests engine's ability to recognize and counter repetitive patterns
test_categories.opening_exploitation: Tests engine's ability to punish poor opening choices
test_categories.basic_tactics: Tests fundamental tactical awareness (pins, forks, skewers)
test_categories.tempo: Tests understanding of move timing and initiative
test_categories.pawn_structure: Tests pawn formation and advancement strategies
test_categories.piece_development: Tests proper piece placement and development
test_categories.mobility: Tests preference for piece activity and movement options
test_categories.piece_safety: Tests ability to protect pieces and avoid blunders
test_categories.deep_search: Tests engine's search depth and calculation ability
test_categories.aggressive_play: Tests response to unconventional aggressive strategies
test_categories.search_optimization: Tests against highly optimized search algorithms
test_categories.endgame: Tests endgame technique and conversion ability
